item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事亚洲
item.description: 中国制造业和房地产数据令人失望以色列准备发动大规模战争罢工菲律宾发现度假酒店中的诈骗农场。您今天需要了解的信息【原文：China’s manufacturing and property figures disappoint. Israel poised for mass strike over war. Philippines uncovers scam farms in resort hotel. Here’s what you need to know today.】

item.title: 欧佩克+增产迹象和中国困境导致石油跌幅扩大
item.description: 有迹象表明，欧佩克+将推进从10月份开始提高产量的计划，而中国的经济阻力也在增加，因此石油走低。【原文：Oil pushed lower on signs OPEC+ will progress with a plan to lift output from October, while economic headwinds mount in China.】

item.title: 工党称，如果燃油补贴继续存在，英国将面临英镑暴跌的风险
item.description: 下议院领袖露西-鲍威尔（Lucy Powell）说，如果英国财政大臣雷切尔-里夫斯（Rachel Reeves）没有取消为 1,000 万养老金领取者提供的冬季燃料补贴以填补公共财政缺口，英国将面临英镑挤兑、利率上升和经济紧缩。【原文：Britain would have faced a run on the pound, higher interest rates and an economic crunch had Chancellor Rachel Reeves not scrapped a winter fuel payment for 10 million pensioners to fill a hole in the public finances, House of Commons Leader Lucy Powell said.】

item.title: 英国北海石油游说团警告称意外增税将导致投资下滑
item.description: 行业游说团体警告说，英国对北海石油和天然气实行的新税制可能导致投资下滑 80% 以上。【原文：The UK’s new tax regime for North Sea oil and gas could lead to an investment slump of more than 80%, the industry lobby group warned.】

item.title: 中国工厂数据公布后，亚洲市场谨慎开盘：市场综述
item.description: 由于越来越多的迹象表明，中国为支持其萎靡不振的经济所做的努力尚未见效，亚洲股市将以谨慎的姿态进入一个历史上动荡不安的月份。【原文：Asian stocks are set for a cautious start into a historically volatile month for markets as signs mount that China’s efforts to support its ailing economy are yet to take hold.】

item.title: 香港正在兴起一种投注科技股的新方式
item.description: 有一种新的方式可以押注一些最受关注的香港股票。【原文：There’s a new way to bet on some of the most watched Hong Kong stocks.】

item.title: 本周全球商品市场值得关注的五大图表
item.description: 阿拉比卡咖啡正逐步接近十多年来从未见过的价格。石油在八月的跌宕起伏让交易商们对年底可能出现的颠簸做好了准备。此外，大豆、玉米和小麦的丰产也拖累了谷物与其他商品的走势。【原文：Arabica coffee is edging closer to prices not seen in more than a decade. Oil’s rocky August has traders bracing for what could be a bumpy ride toward the end of the year. And an abundance of soybean, corn and wheat are proving a drag for grains versus other commodities.】

item.title: 停火协议压力增大，以色列准备发动袭击
item.description: 以色列最大的劳工组织准备在周一举行全国性罢工，这是为迫使政府在加沙停火并确保释放被哈马斯扣押的人质而做出的最有力的推动。【原文：Israel’s largest labor group is poised for a nationwide strike on Monday, the strongest push yet to force the government into a Gaza cease-fire and secure the release of hostages held by Hamas.】

item.title: 汉莎航空首席执行官前往葡萄牙参加有关 TAP 的政府会谈
item.description: 据知情人士透露，德国汉莎航空公司（Deutsche Lufthansa AG）首席执行官卡斯滕-施波尔（Carsten Spohr）将于周一会见葡萄牙政府官员，因为这家德国航空集团正在权衡对国有航空公司 TAP SA 进行投资的可能性。【原文：Deutsche Lufthansa AG Chief Executive Officer Carsten Spohr is set to meet with Portuguese government officials on Monday as the German airline group weighs a possible investment in state-owned airline TAP SA, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 凯尔-巴斯（Kyle Bass）说，"石油黑幕 "始终是 ESG 的败笔
item.description: 凯尔-巴斯（Kyle Bass）认为，华尔街最具争议的投资策略之一，如果其捍卫者从一开始就表现得更温和一些，现在可能就不会那么受人非议了。【原文：One of the most contentious investing strategies on Wall Street might be a lot less beleaguered right now if its defenders had shown a bit more moderation from the get-go, according to Kyle Bass.】

item.title: 美联储减息将撼动市场，Pimco 和 GMO 完善新兴市场游戏规则
item.description: 随着数十年来最令人期待的美国降息为这一今年遭受近 150 亿美元资金外流冲击的资产类别带来新的动力，表现最佳的新兴市场债券经理们正在重新调整仓位。【原文：Top-performing emerging-market bond managers are recalibrating positions as the most anticipated US interest rate cut in decades brings fresh impetus to an asset class buffeted by nearly $15 billion in outflows this year.】

item.title: 特朗普的最新加密事业体现了家族全心全意的支持
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普现在正在倡导一个去中心化的金融平台，同时承诺将美国打造成世界的 "加密货币之都"，所有的目光都聚焦在这位前总统的家人和同伙不断增长的数字资产努力上。【原文：With Donald Trump now championing a decentralized finance platform while pledging to make America the “crypto capital” of the world, all eyes are focused on the growing digital-asset efforts of the former president’s family and associates.】

item.title: 内塔尼亚胡派助手前往莫斯科，寻求在加沙人质问题上取得进展
item.description: 以色列总理本雅明-内塔尼亚胡（Benjamin Netanyahu）的办公室表示，在美国、卡塔尔和埃及带头与哈马斯达成停战协议的努力进展缓慢之际，以色列寻求俄罗斯帮助在释放加沙人质的协议上取得进展。【原文：Israel sought Russia’s help in making progress on a deal to free hostages from Gaza, Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu’s office said, as efforts spearheaded by the US, Qatar and Egypt to secure a truce with Hamas advance slowly.】

item.title: 运量创新高，运价上涨，集装箱承运商利润飙升
item.description: 一项新的分析显示，由于红海改道后货运量创历史新高，运费率上升，全球集装箱航运业第二季度利润激增至 100 多亿美元。【原文：The global container shipping industry saw profits surge to more than $10 billion in the second quarter on record volumes and rising freight rates after Red Sea diversions, according to a new analysis.】

item.title: 菲律宾在网络赌博突击行动中逮捕 150 多名外国人
item.description: 菲律宾当局在周六对一个非法在线游戏中心的突袭行动中逮捕了 150 多名外国公民。【原文：Philippine authorities arrested more than 150 foreign nationals during a raid of an illegal online gaming hub on Saturday.】

item.title: 欧洲股市超越美国市场的努力正在迅速消退
item.description: 由于担心经济放缓影响盈利前景，欧洲股市在短暂跑赢美国股市后，优势逐渐消失。【原文：The promise of European stocks gaining an edge over their US counterparts is fading after a brief spell of outperformance, as concerns of an economic slowdown weigh on the outlook for earnings.】

item.title: 沙特阿拉伯磨坊公司首次公开募股目标筹资高达 2.71 亿美元
item.description: Arabian Mills for Food Products Co.表示，该公司计划在当地证券交易所首次公开发行股票，向投资者出售 30% 的股份，从而筹集高达 2.71 亿美元的资金。【原文：Arabian Mills for Food Products Co. said it plans to raise as much as $271 million by selling a 30% stake to investors in an initial public offering on the local stock exchange.】

item.title: 菲律宾特工在网络犯罪突袭中拘留 160 多人
item.description: 菲律宾马尼拉（美联社）— 菲律宾官员周日表示，菲律宾当局突袭了中部某省的一个涉嫌非法在线游戏和网络诈骗的综合体，拘押了 160 多人— 其中大部分是中国人和印尼人— 他们正在从事基于互联网的犯罪活动。【原文：MANILA, Philippines (AP) — Philippine authorities raided a suspected illegal online gaming and cyberscam complex in a central province and took into custody more than 160 people — mostly Chinese and Indonesians — who were committing internet-based crimes, officials said Sunday.】

item.title: 土耳其企业面临 "一轮又一轮 "的问题，因为 50%的税率会带来影响
item.description: 在顽固的高通胀、成本上升、融资渠道减少和需求疲软等多重因素的打击下，土耳其企业正在无数挑战的重压下苦苦挣扎。【原文：Turkish companies are struggling under the weight of myriad challenges, hit by a combination of stubbornly high inflation, rising costs, dwindling access to finance and weak demand.】

item.title: 澳门博彩业收入上升，夏季需求缓解了打压担忧
item.description: 由于中国暑假期间娱乐需求上升，澳门 8 月份博彩收入增长 14.8%，超出预期，为这个全球最大的赌场中心提供了增长动力。【原文：Macau’s gaming revenue rose 14.8% in August, exceeding forecasts as demand for entertainment rose during China’s summer vacation, providing growth momentum for the world’s largest casino hub.】

item.title: 新加坡华侨银行部分用户的银行网站和移动应用程序瘫痪
item.description: 新加坡贷款机构华侨银行（Oversea-Chinese Banking Corp.【原文：Singapore lender Oversea-Chinese Banking Corp.’s website and mobile app couldn’t be accessed by some users on Sunday.】

item.title: 香港陈光标希望通过访问吸引更多澳大利亚企业
item.description: 香港财政司司长陈茂波本周访问悉尼和墨尔本时，希望吸引更多澳大利亚公司到香港发展。【原文：Hong Kong Financial Secretary Paul Chan aims to attract more Australian companies to the city during his visit to Sydney and Melbourne this week.】

item.title: 捷克提议在 2025 选举年再次削减预算赤字
item.description: 捷克财政保守派政府提交了一份预算草案，旨在进一步减少 2025 年选举年的赤字。【原文：The Czech fiscally conservative government presented a draft budget that seeks to further reduce the deficit in the election year 2025.】

item.title: 巴西特贝特称政府计划在 2025 年进行开支审查
item.description: 巴西规划部长西蒙娜-特贝特（Simone Tebet）表示，巴西政府预计将在明年下半年进行一次 "真正的支出审查"，重点是实现 2026 年的财政目标。【原文：Brazil’s government expects to make a “true spending review” in the second half of next year with a focus on achieving its 2026 fiscal target, according to Planning Minister Simone Tebet.】

item.title: 工党税收计划打击商界领袖信心
item.description: 由于担心工党新政府可能增税，8 月份公司老板对英国经济的乐观情绪急剧下降。【原文：Optimism in the UK economy among company bosses plummeted in August because of worries about likely tax increases from the new Labour government.】

item.title: 最高法院做出裁决后，马斯克的 X 汽车在巴西停产
item.description: 亿万富翁埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）拒绝为其社交网络指定拉丁美洲最大国家的法定代表人，巴西最高法院下令，埃隆-马斯克的 X 公司周六开始在巴西停业。【原文：Elon Musk’s X started to go dark on Saturday in Brazil at the order of the nation’s top court after the billionaire refused to name a legal representative for the social network in Latin America’s largest nation.】

item.title: 在联合国推动结束危机之际，利比亚的石油产量蒙上了一层迷雾
item.description: 利比亚的确切石油产量被蒙上了一层不确定的阴影，有三个油田被命令逐步恢复抽油，即使在这个欧佩克国家的敌对政府之间的争斗中，一个主要油田的产量被进一步削减。【原文：Libya’s exact oil output was clouded in uncertainty, with three fields ordered to gradually resume pumping even as production at a major site was slashed further amid a feud between the OPEC nation’s rival governments.】

item.title: 美国就业数据将帮助美联储衡量经济放缓的程度
item.description: 即将公布的美国劳动力市场数据，包括月度薪资报告，将使美联储政策制定者深入了解在两周多一点的时间内几乎确定降息之后进一步降息的必要性。【原文：Upcoming readouts on the US labor market, including the monthly payrolls report, will give Federal Reserve policymakers insight into the need for further interest-rate reductions after an all-but-certain cut in a little more than two weeks.】

item.title: 业主面临 1.5 万亿美元的商业地产到期墙
item.description: 据仲量联行公司（Jones Lang LaSalle Inc.【原文：Landlords for offices, apartment complexes and other commercial real estate have $1.5 trillion of debt due by the end of next year, and about a quarter of that borrowing could be hard to refinance, according to Jones Lang LaSalle Inc.】

item.title: 石油产量激增，圭亚那将增长预期上调至 43
item.description: 伊尔法安-阿里总统将圭亚那的年增长率从之前的 34.8%提高到 42.8%，因为他预计公共和私营部门将 "加大 "投资。【原文：President Irfaan Ali raised estimates for Guyana’s yearly growth to 42.8% from a prior 34.8%, as he projects “ramped up” investments from the public and private sectors.】
